pages.text: $(li)The Wandering Trader will appear while you explore the Overworld, sometimes accompanied by a couple of $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/llama)Llamas$(/l).$(br)$(li)It will offer you different objects to exchange.$(br)$(li)It will drink an $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/invisibility)Invisibility Potion$(/l) at night to avoid be detected by dangerous creatures.
After a while, the Wandering Trader will go away.
